p: The chromatographic analysis was carried out using a gas chromatograph (Thermo Scientific ISQ type) equipped with a DB-capillary column (30 m × 0.25 mm, film thickness: 0.25 μm). The carrier gas is nitrogen with a flow rate of 15 ml/min. The device is equipped with a PVT (Programmed Vaporization Temperature) injector of the Split-Splitless type. The volume injected was 1 μl. The temperature programming ranges from 40°C to 200°C with a gradient of 4°C/min.
